reduction : Reduction pSpec oSpec StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut
 (do
      let a  (simulateQ loggingOracle (Prover.runToRound (Fin.last n) stmt wit reduction.prover)).run
      (fun a_1 => (reduction.prover.toProverOut.1 a.1.2, a_1.1, a.1.1)) <$>
          (simulateQ loggingOracle (reduction.verifier.verify stmt a.1.1)).run.liftComp

    do
    let __discr  Prover.run stmt wit reduction.prover
    (fun a => ((__discr.1, __discr.2.1), a, __discr.2.2)) <$>

P : Prover pSpec oSpec StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut'
 (fun a =>
        (TransportStatement.fStmtOut StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
            (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
            (a.2.2.1, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2.1).1),

            (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
            (a.2.2.2, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2.1).2),

      Fin.induction
        (pure
          (default,
            P.input
              (TransportStatement.fStmtIn StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
                (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)

                (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                witIn),
            stmtIn, witIn))
        (fun j ih => do
          let __discr  ih
          match hDir : (pSpec j).1 with
            | Direction.V_to_P =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a __discr.1, P.receiveChallenge j, hDir __discr.2.1 a, __discr.2.2)) <$>
                liftM (query (Sum.inr j, hDir) ())
            | Direction.P_to_V =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a.1 __discr.1, a.2, __discr.2.2)) <$>
                (P.sendMessage j, hDir __discr.2.1).liftComp (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge]))
        (Fin.last n) =
    (fun a =>
        (TransportStatement.fStmtOut StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
            (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
            (stmtIn, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2).1),
          TransportWitness.fWitOut WitIn WitOut WitIn' WitOut'
            (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
            (witIn, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2).2),
          a.1)) <$>
      Fin.induction
        (pure
          (default,
            P.input
              (TransportStatement.fStmtIn StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
                (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                stmtIn)
              (TransportWitness.fWitIn WitIn WitOut WitIn' WitOut'
                (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                witIn)))
        (fun j ih => do
          let __discr  ih
          match hDir : (pSpec j).1 with
            | Direction.V_to_P =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a __discr.1, P.receiveChallenge j, hDir __discr.2 a)) <$>
                liftM (query (Sum.inr j, hDir) ())
            | Direction.P_to_V =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a.1 __discr.1, a.2)) <$>
                (P.sendMessage j, hDir __discr.2).liftComp (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge]))
        (Fin.last n)

n : 
pSpec : ProtocolSpec n
 : Type
oSpec : OracleSpec 
StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut : Type
inst : (i : pSpec.ChallengeIdx)  VCVCompatible (pSpec.Challenge i)
stmt : StmtIn
wit : WitIn
reduction : Reduction pSpec oSpec StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut
 (do
      let a 
        (simulateQ loggingOracle
              (Prover.runToRound n pSpec  oSpec StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut inst (Fin.last n) stmt wit
                reduction.prover)).run
      (fun a_1 => (reduction.prover.toProverOut.1 a.1.2, a_1.1, a.1.1)) <$>
          (simulateQ loggingOracle (reduction.verifier.verify stmt a.1.1)).run.liftComp
            (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge])) =
    do
    let __discr  Prover.run n pSpec  oSpec StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut inst stmt wit reduction.prover
    (fun a => ((__discr.1, __discr.2.1), a, __discr.2.2)) <$>
        (reduction.verifier.verify stmt __discr.2.2).liftComp (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge])

: Type

StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut : Type
pSpec : ProtocolSpec 1
inst : pSpec.ProverOnly
stmt : StmtIn
wit : WitIn
reduction : Reduction pSpec oSpec StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut
 (do
      let __discr 
        (fun a =>
              ((reduction.prover.toProverOut.1 a.2).1, (reduction.prover.toProverOut.1 a.2).2, fun i =>
                @Prover.run_of_prover_first.match_1 (fun i => (pSpec i).2) i fun isLt => a.1)) <$>
            (reduction.prover.sendMessage 0,  (reduction.prover.input stmt wit)).liftComp
              (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge])
      ((fun a => ((__discr.1, __discr.2.1), a, __discr.2.2)) <$> reduction.verifier.verify stmt __discr.2.2).liftComp
          (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge])) =
    do
    let __discr 
      (reduction.prover.sendMessage 0,  (reduction.prover.input stmt wit)).liftComp (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge])
    ((fun a =>
              (reduction.prover.toProverOut.1 __discr.2, a, fun i =>
                @Prover.run_of_prover_first.match_1 (fun i => (pSpec i).2) i fun isLt => __discr.1)) <$>
            reduction.verifier.verify stmt fun i =>
              @Prover.run_of_prover_first.match_1 (fun i => (pSpec i).2) i fun isLt => __discr.1).liftComp
        (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge])

                (P.sendMessage j, hDir __discr.2.1).liftComp (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge]))
        (Fin.last n) =
    (fun a =>
        (TransportStatement.fStmtOut StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
            (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)

            (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
            (witIn, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2).2),
          a.1)) <$>
      Fin.induction
        (pure
          (default,
            P.input
              (TransportStatement.fStmtIn StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
                (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                stmtIn)

                (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                witIn)))
        (fun j ih => do
          let __discr  ih
          match hDir : (pSpec j).1 with
            | Direction.V_to_P =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a __discr.1, P.receiveChallenge j, hDir __discr.2 a)) <$>
                liftM (query (Sum.inr j, hDir) ())
            | Direction.P_to_V =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a.1 __discr.1, a.2)) <$>
                (P.sendMessage j, hDir __discr.2).liftComp (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge]))
        (Fin.last n)

 : Type
inst : DecidableEq 
oSpec : OracleSpec 
StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' : Type
inst : (i : pSpec.ChallengeIdx)  VCVCompatible (pSpec.Challenge i)
inst : oSpec.FiniteRange
data : TransportData StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut'
stmtIn : StmtIn
witIn : WitIn
P : Prover pSpec oSpec StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut'
 (fun a =>
        (TransportStatement.fStmtOut StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
            (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
            (a.2.2.1, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2.1).1),
          TransportWitness.fWitOut WitIn WitOut WitIn' WitOut'
            (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
            (a.2.2.2, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2.1).2),
          a.1)) <$>
      Fin.induction
        (pure
          (default,
            P.input
              (TransportStatement.fStmtIn StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
                (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                stmtIn)
              (TransportWitness.fWitIn WitIn WitOut WitIn' WitOut'
                (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                witIn),
            stmtIn, witIn))
        (fun j ih => do
          let __discr  ih
          match hDir : (pSpec j).1 with
            | Direction.V_to_P =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a __discr.1, P.receiveChallenge j, hDir __discr.2.1 a, __discr.2.2)) <$>
                liftM (query (Sum.inr j, hDir) ())
            | Direction.P_to_V =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a.1 __discr.1, a.2, __discr.2.2)) <$>
                (P.sendMessage j, hDir __discr.2.1).liftComp (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge]))
        (Fin.last n) =
    (fun a =>
        (TransportStatement.fStmtOut StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
            (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
            (stmtIn, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2).1),
          TransportWitness.fWitOut WitIn WitOut WitIn' WitOut'
            (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
            (witIn, (P.toProverOut.1 a.2).2),
          a.1)) <$>
      Fin.induction
        (pure
          (default,
            P.input
              (TransportStatement.fStmtIn StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
                (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                stmtIn)
              (TransportWitness.fWitIn WitIn WitOut WitIn' WitOut'
                (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                witIn)))
        (fun j ih => do
          let __discr  ih
          match hDir : (pSpec j).1 with
            | Direction.V_to_P =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a __discr.1, P.receiveChallenge j, hDir __discr.2 a)) <$>
                liftM (query (Sum.inr j, hDir) ())
            | Direction.P_to_V =>
              (fun a => (Transcript.snoc a.1 __discr.1, a.2)) <$>
                (P.sendMessage j, hDir __discr.2).liftComp (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge]))
        (Fin.last n)

 : Type

stmtIn : StmtIn
witIn : WitIn
R : Reduction pSpec oSpec StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut'
 (do
      let a 
        Prover.run
            (TransportStatement.fStmtIn StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
              (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
              stmtIn)
            (TransportWitness.fWitIn WitIn WitOut WitIn' WitOut'
              (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data) witIn)
            R.prover
      (fun a_1 =>
            ((TransportStatement.fStmtOut StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
                  (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                  (stmtIn, a.1),
                TransportWitness.fWitOut WitIn WitOut WitIn' WitOut'
                  (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                  (witIn, a.2.1)),
              a_1, a.2.2)) <$>
          (Verifier.run stmtIn a.2.2
                {
                  verify := fun stmtIn transcript =>
                    (fun a =>
                        TransportStatement.fStmtOut StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
                          (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut'
                            WitOut' data)
                          (stmtIn, a)) <$>
                      R.verifier.verify
                        (TransportStatement.fStmtIn StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
                          (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut'
                            WitOut' data)
                          stmtIn)
                        transcript }).liftComp
            (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge])) =
    do
    let a 
      Prover.run
          (TransportStatement.fStmtIn StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
            (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
            stmtIn)
          (TransportWitness.fWitIn WitIn WitOut WitIn' WitOut'
            (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data) witIn)
          R.prover
    (fun a_1 =>
          ((TransportStatement.fStmtOut StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
                (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                (stmtIn, a.1),
              TransportWitness.fWitOut WitIn WitOut WitIn' WitOut'
                (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                (witIn, a.2.1)),
            TransportStatement.fStmtOut StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
              (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
              (stmtIn, a_1),
            a.2.2)) <$>
        (Verifier.run
              (TransportStatement.fStmtIn StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
                (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                stmtIn)
              a.2.2 R.verifier).liftComp
          (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge])

                                WitOut' data)
                              stmtIn)
                            transcript })).run.liftComp
            (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge])) =
    do
    let a 
      Prover.runWithLog
          (TransportStatement.fStmtIn StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'

            stmtIn)
          (TransportWitness.fWitIn WitIn WitOut WitIn' WitOut'

    (fun a_1 =>

              TransportWitness.fWitOut WitIn WitOut WitIn' WitOut'
                (TransportData.toTransportWitness StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
                (witIn, a.2.1)),
            TransportStatement.fStmtOut StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
              (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut' data)
              (stmtIn, a_1.1),
            a.2.2.1, a.2.2.2, a_1.2)) <$>
        (simulateQ loggingOracle
                (Verifier.run
                  (TransportStatement.fStmtIn StmtIn StmtOut StmtIn' StmtOut'
                    (TransportData.toTransportStatement StmtIn WitIn StmtOut WitOut StmtIn' WitIn' StmtOut' WitOut'
                      data)
                    stmtIn)
                  a.2.2.1 R.verifier)).run.liftComp
          (oSpec ++ [pSpec.Challenge])
